meanings.definition: A salt or ester of bisulfurous acid.
meanings.sent1: I added a pinch of bisulfite to the solution.
meanings.sent2: The bisulfite dissolved completely in the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled bisulfite all over the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a bubbling flask of bisulfite.
meanings.sent5: The smell of bisulfite lingered in the air, sharp and pungent.

meanings.definition: A compound containing the anion HSO3-.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician carefully measured the bisulfite compound.
meanings.sent2: The formula of the bisulfite compound was written on the whiteboard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student swapped the labels on the bisulfite compound jars.
meanings.sent4: The bisulfite compound acted as a shield against the harsh chemicals.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the bisulfite compound sparkled like tiny diamonds.
